CreateExperimentTemplate.name: CreateExperimentTemplate
CreateExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to create an AWS FIS experiment template

CreateTargetAccountConfiguration.name: CreateTargetAccountConfiguration
CreateTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an AWS FIS target account configuration

DeleteExperimentTemplate.name: DeleteExperimentTemplate
DeleteExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete the AWS FIS experiment template

DeleteTargetAccountConfiguration.name: DeleteTargetAccountConfiguration
DeleteTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS FIS target account configuration

GetAction.name: GetAction
GetAction.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS action

GetExperiment.name: GetExperiment
GetExperiment.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS experiment

GetExperimentTargetAccountConfiguration.name: GetExperimentTargetAccountConfiguration
GetExperimentTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS target account configuration for an AWS FIS experiment

GetExperimentTemplate.name: GetExperimentTemplate
GetExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS Experiment Template

GetTargetAccountConfiguration.name: GetTargetAccountConfiguration
GetTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS target account configuration for an AWS FIS experiment template

GetTargetResourceType.name: GetTargetResourceType
GetTargetResourceType.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified resource type

InjectApiInternalError.name: InjectApiInternalError
InjectApiInternalError.description: Grants permission to inject an API internal error on the provided AWS service from an FIS Experiment

InjectApiThrottleError.name: InjectApiThrottleError
InjectApiThrottleError.description: Grants permission to inject an API throttle error on the provided AWS service from an FIS Experiment

InjectApiUnavailableError.name: InjectApiUnavailableError
InjectApiUnavailableError.description: Grants permission to inject an API unavailable error on the provided AWS service from an FIS Experiment

ListActions.name: ListActions
ListActions.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS actions

ListExperimentResolvedTargets.name: ListExperimentResolvedTargets
ListExperimentResolvedTargets.description: Grants permission to list resolved targets for AWS FIS experiments

ListExperimentTargetAccountConfiguration.name: ListExperimentTargetAccountConfigurations
ListExperimentTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to list target account configurations for AWS FIS experiments

ListExperimentTemplates.name: ListExperimentTemplates
ListExperimentTemplates.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS experiment templates

ListExperiments.name: ListExperiments
ListExperiments.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS experiments

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an AWS FIS resource

ListTargetAccountConfigurations.name: ListTargetAccountConfigurations
ListTargetAccountConfigurations.description: Grants permission to list target account configurations for AWS FIS experiment templates

ListTargetResourceTypes.name: ListTargetResourceTypes
ListTargetResourceTypes.description: Grants permission to list the resource types

StartExperiment.name: StartExperiment
StartExperiment.description: Grants permission to run an AWS FIS experiment

StopExperiment.name: StopExperiment
StopExperiment.description: Grants permission to stop an AWS FIS experiment

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag AWS FIS resources

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag AWS FIS resources

UpdateExperimentTemplate.name: UpdateExperimentTemplate
UpdateExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to update the specified AWS FIS experiment template

UpdateTargetAccountConfiguration.name: UpdateTargetAccountConfiguration
UpdateTargetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update an AWS FIS target account configuration
